channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This strategist said gold would top $4,000 by year-end. He was right. Here’s what he foresees in 2026.
item.description: On what’s looking like another record day for precious metals, Yardeni Research is now saying will reach $6,000 by the end of 2026.

item.title: ServiceNow acquires Armis for $7.75 billion as it bets big on cybersecurity for AI
item.description: The deal expands ServiceNow’s reach into cybersecurity as it aims to create an ‘AI control tower.’

item.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
U.S. economy posted biggest growth spurt in two years, GDP shows. Don’t expect a repeat.
item.description: The U.S. grew at a snappy 4.3% annual pace in the third quarter — the biggest increase in two years — but the economy is unlikely to match that feat i...

item.title: Kroger’s stock may not seem so hot to investors, but the grocer keeps buying
item.description: Kroger boosts its stock buyback program, just as the shares are in danger of having their worst month in three years.

item.title: Evercore ISI sees accelerating growth at Live Nation, names it top media pick for 2026
item.description: Evercore ISI's new price target implies a 33% upside ahead for shares of Live Nation Entertainment.

item.title: It's time to buy the dip on Meta, says Baird
item.description: Baird's price target for Meta implies an upside ahead of 23%.

item.title: AI spending is expected to stay strong in 2026. Barclays thinks these stocks will benefit
item.description: Barclays analysts highlighted a dozen overweight-rated stocks that it views as best-positioned to capitalize on higher-than-expected AI spending next ...

item.title: Citadel to return $5 billion in profit to investors, source says
item.description: The firm's flagship-multistrategy fund, known as Wellington, gained 9.3% in the year through last week, the person said.

item.title: Canaccord says Tesla demand slowdown is temporary, hikes price target
item.description: Canaccord Genuity's new price target for Tesla implies potential upside ahead of 13%.

item.title: Holy Ship! HII Stock Jumps on Trump Navy Ship Plans
item.description: HII stock rises on Trump's Golden Fleet plans for new powerful warships. Explore how navy announcements impact markets, with balanced views on potenti...

item.title: Intuitive Machines Stock Rockets on Analyst Upgrade

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Surges on Trump Admin Pipeline Boost

item.title: DBVT Stock Rockets on Positive Peanut Allergy Patch Trial
item.description: DBVT stock surges as much as 46% on positive Phase 3 results for Viaskin Peanut patch, a potential breakthrough treatment for peanut allergies in youn...

item.title: Trump’s Weed Pivot Ignites CGC Stock Surge
item.description: Canopy Growth (CGC) surges 50%+ as Trump eyes marijuana reclassification. Explore the buzz, risks, and trading lessons in this volatile sector.
